zh: 学生们反抗政府。

en: Since the student has worked very hard, he is making rapid progress.
zh: 因为这学生学习很努力，所以进步非常快。

en: The student majors in philosophy.
zh: 那个学生是学哲学的。

en: The student insulted the teacher.
zh: 那个学生顶撞了老师。

en: The student was kind enough to show me the way.
zh: 那个学生人真好，给我带了路。

en: The student is working at sociology.
zh: 那个学生正在钻研社会学。

en: The student gave himself up to despair.
zh: 那个学生彻底绝望了。

en: The student concentrated on his subject.
zh: 那个学生一心扑在自己的课题上。

en: The student arrived after the examination was over.
zh: 考试都结束了，那个学生才赶到。

en: The student may have copied the figures in a hurry.
zh: 那个学生可能是匆忙中抄错了数字。

en: Being a science student, one naturally thinks quickly, so the student snapped up and replied.
zh: 到底是理科生，反应就是快，那个学生立马就回话了。

en: The students were all looking forward to summer vacation.
zh: 学生们都盼着放暑假呢。

en: The student speaks English a little.
zh: 那个学生会说一点儿英语。

en: The student failed to account for the mistake.
zh: 那个学生没法合理解释那个错误。

en: The student ordered the book from New York.
zh: 那个学生从纽约订了那本书。

en: The student was punished for cheating.
zh: 那个学生因为作弊受罚了。

en: The student took to heart the judge's critical comments on his speech.
zh: 那个学生把评委对他演讲的批评记在了心里。

en: The student's cheating was easily caught out.
zh: 那个学生作弊一下子就被抓住了。

en: When I asked the college student if he regularly attended his school, he was at a loss for an answer.
zh: 我问那个大学生是不是经常去上课，他一下子答不上来。

en: The students are apt to make the same mistakes.
zh: 学生们经常犯同样的错误。

en: All the students study English.
zh: 所有的学生都学英语。

en: The speech made by the student was interesting.
zh: 那个学生的演讲挺有意思的。

en: The scholar spent what little money he had on books.
zh: 那个学者把他那点儿可怜的积蓄全用来买书了。

en: The learned man worships his ancestors.
zh: 那个博学的人祭拜他的祖先。

en: The scholar is an authority on fiscal policy.
zh: 那个学者是财政政策方面的权威。

en: The scholar carried on his lifework.
zh: 那位学者继续从事着他毕生的事业。

en: The scholar carried out his lifework at the age of seventy.
zh: 那位学者在七十岁的时候完成了他一生的事业。

en: The scholar regards so-called compulsory education as useless.
zh: 那个学者觉得所谓的义务教育根本没用。

en: The speech of the scholar is well worth listening to.
zh: 那个学者的演讲很值得一听。

en: The school has turned out many inventors.
zh: 这所学校培养出了很多发明家。

en: The school supplies the students with books.
zh: 学校给学生提供书籍。

en: The school is a half-mile walk from my house.
zh: 从我家到学校走半英里就到了。

en: That school is equipped with the latest gymnastics apparatus.
zh: 那所学校配备了最新的体操器材。

en: Students are forbidden to smoke on the school grounds.
zh: 学生不准在校内抽烟。

en: The school is located on a hill.
zh: 学校在小山上。

en: The school is located at the foot of a hill.
zh: 学校在山脚下。

en: The school looks like a prison.
zh: 那个学校看着跟监狱似的。

en: The school was founded seventy years ago.
zh: 这所学校是七十年前建的。

en: This school was founded in 1970.
zh: 这所学校建于1970年。

en: The school was established in 1650.
zh: 这所学校建于1650年。

en: Bear in mind that that school is an integrated junior high and high school.
zh: 别忘了，那所学校是初高中一贯制的。

en: The school should do away with the uniform.
zh: 学校应该取消校服制度。

en: Every child in the school took to the new teacher.
zh: 学校里的每个孩子都挺喜欢那个新老师。

en: The level of the school is high.
zh: 这所学校的水平很高。

en: I inquired at the school only to find there was no student by the name of Yamada.
zh: 我去学校打听了一下，结果发现压根没有叫山田的学生。

en: The school boasts a fine swimming pool.
zh: 那所学校有个很棒的游泳池。

en: There are 2,000 students in the school.
zh: 这所学校有两千名学生。

en: The school is equipped with four computers.
zh: 学校配了四台电脑。

en: When the school needed a new teacher, he applied for the position.
zh: 学校缺老师的时候，他去应聘了。

en: The school needed a new teacher.
zh: 学校需要一名新老师。

en: The school does not allow students to smoke on campus.
zh: 学校不准学生在校内抽烟。

en: The leather jacket has worn out at the elbow.
zh: 这件皮夹克的胳膊肘磨破了。

en: The cabinet minister wound up submitting his resignation.
zh: 部长最后还是递交了辞呈。

en: Turn left at the corner.
zh: 在拐角处往左拐。

en: Turn left at the next corner, and you'll find the station.
zh: 下个路口往左拐，你就能看到车站了。

en: Turning the corner, you will find my house.
zh: 拐过弯儿，你就能看到我家了。

en: The town was full of activity.
zh: 镇上特别热闹。

en: The sea came in sight of us as we turned the corner.
zh: 我们一拐过弯儿就看到了大海。

en: The town is situated 1,500 meters above sea level.
zh: 这个小镇海拔一千五百米。

en: The shops in the street were for the most part closed.
zh: 街上的商店大部分都关门了。

en: There is a very old temple in the town.
zh: 镇上有一座挺老的庙。

en: The cliff hangs over the road.
zh: 悬崖就在路的正上方。

en: The cliff is almost vertical.
zh: 这悬崖几乎是垂直的。

en: The foreigner comes from Scotland.
zh: 那个外国人是苏格兰来的。

en: I thought the little boy who was staring and pointing at the foreigner was very rude.
zh: 我觉得那个一直盯着外国人还指指点点的小男孩挺没礼貌的。

en: The foreigner spoke Japanese as if it were her mother tongue.
zh: 那个外国人日语说得跟母语一样流利。

en: The foreigner didn't know Japanese at all.
zh: 那个外国人一点日语也不会。

en: The foreigner speaks Japanese fairly well.
zh: 那个外国人日语说得还真不错。

en: The foreigner soon got used to Japanese food.
zh: 那个外国人很快就吃惯日本菜了。

en: The surgeon operated on the patient.
zh: 外科医生给病人做了手术。

en: You must not go up the stairs.
zh: 你千万别上楼。

en: I found the picture interesting.
zh: 我觉得这张画挺有意思的。

en: The painting is not worth the price you are asking.
zh: 这幅画不值你开的那个价。

en: The painting turned out to be a Turner.
zh: 没想到这幅画竟然是透纳的作品。

en: The painting is the work of a Dutch master.
zh: 这幅画是一位荷兰大师的作品。

en: I never see that picture without being reminded of my hometown.
zh: 我每次看到这张照片都会想起老家。

en: The picture reminds me of my school days.
zh: 这张照片让我想起了学生时代。

en: The picture set her wondering.
zh: 这张画让她陷入了沉思。

en: When I saw the picture, I remembered the story.
zh: 我看到这张画的时候，想起了那个故事。

en: Please let me have a look at those pictures.
zh: 让我看看那些照片。

en: I've seen that picture before.
zh: 我以前见过这张画。

en: The picture is true to life.
zh: 这幅画画得真传神。

en: The pictures are of her own painting.
zh: 这些画都是她自己画的。

en: The drawing was mounted in a fancy frame.
zh: 那幅画装在了一个挺精致的画框里。

en: The picture was wonderful.
zh: 那张画太棒了。

en: The painting was the object of admiration.
zh: 大家都对那幅画赞叹不已。

en: The painting will cost at least 1,000 dollars.
zh: 这幅画起码要一千美元。

en: The picture looks nicer from a distance.
zh: 这幅画远看更好看一点。

en: That picture doesn't seem ugly to me; on the contrary, I think it's rather beautiful.
zh: 我倒不觉得那张画丑，相反，我觉得挺好看的。

en: The picture has been drawn well as yet.
zh: 到目前为止，这画画得挺好的。

en: This painting has poor composition.
zh: 这幅画构图不太好。

en: The picture of beauty beyond description.
zh: 这画简直美得没法用语言形容。

en: The picture is hung upside down.
zh: 这画挂反了。

en: The picture has already been finished by him.
zh: 他已经把画画完了。

en: The painting is all but finished.
zh: 这幅画基本画好了。

en: The picture was painted by Picasso.
zh: 这幅画是毕加索画的。

en: The picture is presumed to have been painted by Picasso.
zh: 大家普遍认为这幅画是毕加索的作品。

en: The picture is good in its way.
zh: 这画自有它的独到之处。

en: The picture was wonderful. You ought to have seen it.
zh: 那幅画太棒了，你真该去看看。

en: The picture was hung upside down.
zh: 那幅画挂倒了。

en: The picture is colorful in contrast with this one.
zh: 跟这张比，那张画色彩特别丰富。

en: The cost of the painting is very high.
zh: 这幅画挺贵的。

en: The price of the picture is 10 pounds.
zh: 这张画10英镑。

en: We cannot rate the picture highly enough.
zh: 这张画怎么夸都不为过。

en: There is a castle in the background of the picture.
zh: 画的背景里有一个城堡。

en: I like neither of the pictures.
zh: 这两张画我都不喜欢。

en: I can see some intricate patterns in the picture.
zh: 我能看到画里有一些复杂的图案。

en: The picture has a charm of its own.
zh: 这张画有它独特的魅力。

en: I paid only a trifle for the picture.
zh: 这张画我只花了一点儿小钱。

en: The picture was priced at 200,000 yen.
zh: 这张画标价20万日元。

en: Can you see the picture?
zh: 你能看到那张画吗？

en: The neighborhood is alive with activities.
zh: 这一带到处都是活动，挺热闹的。

en: They are building a long bridge across the channel.
zh: 他们正在海峡上建一座长桥。

en: People call the sea the Mediterranean.
zh: 大家把这片海叫作地中海。

en: The ghost story was terrifying.
zh: 那个鬼故事挺吓人的。

en: The injured man is now at rest.
zh: 那个受伤的人现在已经安息了。

en: The strange-looking woman was thought to be a witch.
zh: 那个长相奇怪的女人被认为是个女巫。

en: The broken doll is mine.
zh: 那个坏了的娃娃是我的。

en: The memoir breathes the deepest respect for his father.
zh: 这部回忆录字里行间透着对他父亲的极度尊敬。

en: The newscaster puts too much emphasis on the food crisis.
zh: 新闻播音员太强调粮食危机了。

en: It doesn't require a scholar to interpret.
zh: 解释这个并不需要什么学者。

en: The firm has made large profits from exports.
zh: 这家公司靠出口赚了大钱。

en: The company closes its books at the end of March.
zh: 公司在三月底结账。

en: The company provides them with uniforms.
zh: 公司给他们提供制服。

en: The company suffered a 15% drop in sales.
zh: 公司的销售额下降了15%。

en: The company is incorporated in Japan.
zh: 这家公司是在日本注册的。

en: That company ranks No. 1 in Japan.
zh: 那家公司在日本排名第一。

en: The company wants to employ 20 people.
zh: 公司想招20个人。

en: The company went bankrupt.
zh: 公司破产了。

en: There's another rumor in the air that the firm is going into bankruptcy.
zh: 又有传言说公司要破产了。

en: The company manufactures electrical goods.
zh: 这家公司生产电器。

en: The company aims to branch out into China.
zh: 公司的目标是把业务拓展到中国。

en: That company is on the rocks because of bad debts.
zh: 那家公司因为坏账快倒闭了。

en: The company has branches in all large cities.
zh: 公司在各大城市都有分部。

en: The company suffered a great loss.
zh: 公司遭受了巨大损失。

en: The company is located in the suburbs of Osaka.
zh: 公司位于大阪郊区。

en: The company was absorbed into a big business.
zh: 公司被一家大企业吞并了。

en: The company suffered a heavy loss.
zh: 公司遭受了严重的亏损。

en: The company was forced to lay off many employees.
zh: 公司被迫裁掉了许多员工。

en: The company is owned by a group of entrepreneurs who started it right after the war.
zh: 这家公司是由一群战后创业的企业家拥有的。

en: The company is located on the West Coast.
zh: 公司位于西海岸。

en: The company suffered big losses.
zh: 公司亏损惨重。

en: The firm has bought some new cars.
zh: 公司买了几辆新车。

en: The company is bringing out a new kind of sports car.
zh: 公司正在推出一款新型跑车。

en: The company was transferred to a new man.
zh: 公司转给了一个新人经营。

en: The company published a new magazine.
zh: 公司出了一本新杂志。

en: How did the company dream up its new ad campaign?
zh: 公司是怎么想出那个新广告策划的？

en: The company has purchased a new computer system.
zh: 公司买了一套新的电脑系统。

en: The company always strives to satisfy its customers.
zh: 公司总是努力让客户满意。

en: The company invited their prospective customers to the party.
zh: 公司邀请了潜在客户来参加派对。

en: The firm provides its workers with their uniforms, but they are expected to have them regularly cleaned.
zh: 公司给员工发制服，但要求他们自己定期清洗。

en: That company deals mainly in imported goods.
zh: 那家公司主要做进口商品生意。

en: How many cars has that company bought?
zh: 那家公司买了多少辆车？

en: The company employs new staff seasonally.
zh: 那家公司按季节招新人。

en: The company laid off twenty percent of its work force; therefore, expenses decreased.
zh: 那家公司裁了百分之二十的员工，所以开支减少了。

en: The company stands for free trade.
zh: 这家公司支持自由贸易。

en: The company didn't make any effort to improve its business practices.
zh: 这家公司根本没想过要改进他们的经营方式。

en: That company is, in effect, bankrupt.
zh: 那家公司实际上已经破产了。

en: The company was started with $100,000 in capital.
zh: 这家公司当初是用10万美元起家的。

en: The company couldn't fill my order.
zh: 那家公司没办法处理我的订单。

en: The firm has recently diversified its products so as to extend its market.
zh: 那家公司最近增加了产品种类来扩大市场。

en: The company is on the verge of bankruptcy.
zh: 那家公司快要破产了。

en: The firm is known for its high-quality products.
zh: 这家公司以产品质量好而闻名。

en: The company manufactures a wide variety of musical instruments.
zh: 这家公司生产各种各样的乐器。

en: The company spends a lot of money on advertising.
zh: 这家公司在广告上花了很多钱。

en: The firm decided to do away with the old machinery.
zh: 公司决定淘汰那些旧机器。

en: The company has changed hands three times.
zh: 这家公司已经易手三次了。

en: The company introduced Japanese methods into its business.
zh: 公司在经营中引进了日本的管理方法。

en: The firm publishes educational books.
zh: 这家公司出版教育类书籍。

en: Having fallen victim to increased competition, the company went bankrupt.
zh: 因为竞争太激烈，那家公司倒闭了。

en: The company is losing money heavily.
zh: 这家公司亏损很严重。

en: The company suffered a loss of one billion yen last year.
zh: 那家公司去年亏损了十亿日元。

en: The company couldn't cope with sudden changes.
zh: 那家公司应付不了突然的变化。

en: It's all up with the firm.
zh: 这家公司彻底完了。

en: The firm is under foreign management.
zh: 这家公司由外资管理。

en: The company turned him down for no apparent reason.
zh: 那家公司没给什么明确的理由就拒绝了他。

en: The company is our wholly-owned subsidiary.
zh: 那家公司是我们的全资子公司。

en: What does the company produce?
zh: 那家公司生产什么？

en: That company is one of the best in the business.
zh: 那家公司是行业里最顶尖的之一。

en: The company will soon go bankrupt.
zh: 那家公司很快就要倒闭了。

en: The company once again went into the red. It is beyond saving.
zh: 那家公司又亏损了，已经没救了。

en: The firm has built up a wide reputation for fair dealing.
zh: 这家公司以诚信经营而闻名。

en: The company will hold a presentation of the new model tomorrow.
zh: 公司明天会举办新产品的发布会。

en: The company will advertise its new product on television.
zh: 公司要在电视上给新产品打广告。

en: The company has already established its fame as a robot manufacturing company.
zh: 这家公司在机器人制造领域已经很有名了。

en: The company has cut a figure in the computer industry.
zh: 那家公司在电脑行业很有影响力。

en: The company is trying to improve its image.
zh: 公司正努力改善自己的形象。

en: The company is 51% owned by American capital.
zh: 这家公司有51%的美国资本。

en: The company employs 500 workers.
zh: 那家公司有500名员工。

en: The company has decided to employ two new secretaries.
zh: 公司决定招两个新秘书。

en: The company develops new products every other month.
zh: 那家公司每隔一个月就开发出新产品。

en: The company was founded in 1974.
zh: 这家公司成立于1974年。

en: The company was established in 1950 by the incumbent chairman.
zh: 这家公司是由现任董事长在1950年创办的。

en: The company is wholly owned by the local government.
zh: 这家公司由当地政府全资拥有。

en: The company gave him a gold watch in acknowledgement of his services.
zh: 为了感谢他的贡献，公司送了他一块金表。

en: Workers at the company went on a strike.
zh: 那家公司的员工罢工了。

en: The company's profit amounted to $250 million before tax.
zh: 这家公司的税前利润达到了2.5亿美元。

en: The company's profitability improved.
zh: 公司的盈利能力提高了。

en: The staff at the company tried to cover up the truth, but soon it came to light.
zh: 公司员工试图隐瞒真相，但很快就曝光了。

en: The company has a capital of 500,000 pounds.
zh: 那家公司的注册资本是50万英镑。

en: The strength of the firm is attributed to its future-oriented strategy.
zh: 这家公司的实力归功于它面向未来的战略。

en: The rapid growth of the firm was attributed to its unique strategy.
zh: 这家公司的快速增长归功于它独特的战略。

en: The company shares give a high yield.
zh: 这公司的股票收益很高。

en: The big promotion of that company's stock was just a cover-up to hide their impending bankruptcy.
zh: 那家公司大搞股票促销其实就是为了掩盖快要破产的事实。

en: This company's stock closed at 932 yen yesterday.
zh: 这家公司的股票昨天收盘价是932日元。

en: The company's financial year runs from April until March of the following year.
zh: 公司的财年是从4月到第二年的3月。

en: Only members of the company are entitled to use the facilities.
zh: 只有公司员工才能使用这些设施。

en: He had not been employed by the company three years before he become a director.
zh: 他进公司不到三年就当上董事了。

en: It has been unofficially decided that I will be employed by the company.
zh: 公司已经内定录用我了。

en: He got into the habit of smoking soon after he got a job in the company.
zh: 他进公司工作不久就学会抽烟了。

en: The company has hard and fast rules against lateness.
zh: 公司对迟到有很死板的规定。

en: The company is open for equity participation by anybody.
zh: 这公司谁都可以入股。

en: The company has three hospitals of its own.
zh: 这公司自己有三家医院。

en: Millions of dollars have been spent trying to shore up the company.
zh: 为了扶持这家公司，已经砸了几百万美元了。

en: There is a scheme to expand the company.
zh: 有个扩张公司的计划。

en: Every man and woman in the company is well trained.
zh: 公司里的每个人都受过很好的培训。

en: The "retired" president of that company runs the whole show from behind the scenes, so the current president is nothing but a figurehead.
zh: 那家公司退了休的总裁还在幕后操纵全局，现在的总裁不过是个傀儡。

en: The meeting, in short, was a waste of time.
zh: 总之，这会就是浪费时间。

en: The meeting was held as intended at the outset.
zh: 会议是按原计划举行的。

en: The meeting will be held next week at the earliest.
zh: 会最快也要到下周才开。

en: The meeting took place last week.
zh: 会是上周开的。

en: I thought that meeting would never conclude.
zh: 我原以为那会永远没个完。

en: The meeting was put off because John was sick.
zh: 因为约翰病了，会议推迟了。

en: The meeting is all over.
zh: 会已经开完了。

en: The meeting is to be held here tomorrow.
zh: 明天在这儿开会。

en: The meeting will take place tomorrow.
zh: 明天开会。

en: The meeting was called off.
zh: 会议取消了。

en: Those present at the meeting were surprised at the news.
zh: 出席会议的人听到这消息都很吃惊。

en: A variety of people gathered at the meeting.
zh: 各种各样的人都来开会了。

en: Only one third of the members turned up at the meeting.
zh: 只有三分之一的成员出席了会议。

en: It is desirable that you should attend the meeting.
zh: 你最好能参加一下这个会。

en: We had better not attend the meeting.
zh: 我们最好别去参加那个会。

en: At the meeting he said a lot, but his argument did not hold water.
zh: 他在会上说了一大堆，但根本站不住脚。

en: I acted as interpreter at the meeting.
zh: 我在会上当翻译。

en: The first speech was given at the convention by none other than Clint Eastwood, the famous actor.
zh: 在大会上第一个发言的不是别人，正是著名演员克林特·伊斯特伍德。

en: No suspicion may be attached to the accountant.
zh: 会计没什么可怀疑的。

en: The meeting room is in use now.
zh: 会议室现在正用着呢。

en: We adjourned the meeting until the following Friday.
zh: 会议延期到下周五再开。

en: The meeting has been fixed for next week.
zh: 会议定在下周开。

en: The conference takes place annually.
zh: 这个会议每年举行一次。

en: The conference was presided over by Mr Mori.
zh: 会议由森先生主持。

en: The meeting was called off as there was no hope of agreement on either side.
zh: 因为双方没可能达成一致，会议取消了。

en: The conference passed off well.
zh: 会议进行得很顺利。

en: The conference was scheduled for March, but it has been put off till April.
zh: 会议原定在三月，但推迟到了四月。

en: There were thirty people present at the meeting.
zh: 会有三十个人参加。

en: Were you present at the meeting?
zh: 你去参加那个会了吗？

en: The conference drew 150 diplomats.
zh: 这次会议吸引了150名外交官。

en: The meeting is held annually.
zh: 这个会每年开一次。

en: The meeting was not particularly well attended.
zh: 没多少人来开会。

en: The meeting will be held at 10:30 a.m. on Saturday.
zh: 会议周六上午10点半开。

en: The meeting can't be held until Monday at earliest.
zh: 会议最快也要到周一才能开。

en: The party ended at ten o'clock.
zh: 聚会十点钟结束了。

en: That party was held under the auspices of the Foreign Ministry.
zh: 那场派对是外交部主办的。

en: The meeting is held once in three years.
zh: 这个会每三年开一次。

en: The meeting is to be held at three.
zh: 会议三点钟开。

en: I applied for membership in the association.
zh: 我申请加入那个协会了。

en: I had expected him at the meeting.
zh: 我原本以为他会来开会的。

en: I didn't commit myself to attend the meeting.
zh: 我没保证说一定会去开会。

en: I will present myself at the meeting.
zh: 我会出席那个会议的。

en: Everybody was bright at the party.
zh: 派对上大家都兴致很高。

en: They are going to exhibit many famous old paintings at the gallery.
zh: 画廊要展出很多著名的古画。

en: The painter went to Paris with the object of studying painting.
zh: 那个画家去巴黎是为了学画画。

en: The artist has an individualistic style of painting.
zh: 这个画家的画风挺有个人特色的。

en: The painter died young.
zh: 那个画家年纪轻轻就去世了。

en: The artist always painted alone.
zh: 那个画家总是独自作画。

en: The artist is eternally a boy.
zh: 那个艺术家永远有一颗童心。

en: Her kingdom is your hell.
zh: 她的王国就是你的地狱。

en: I explained the process to him.
zh: 我跟他解释了一下这个过程。

en: There is a rumor that the radicals are plotting against the government.
zh: 有传言说激进分子在密谋反对政府。

en: The freight was insured against all risks.
zh: 这批货保了全险。

en: We will discuss that later.
zh: 那个我们待会再聊。

en: The flower garden needs watering.
zh: 花园该浇水了。

en: Have you gone over the lesson?
zh: 你复习过功课了吗？

en: The flowers will look more beautiful in the vase.
zh: 花插在花瓶里会更好看。

en: The flowers give off a very pleasant perfume.
zh: 这些花闻着特别香。

en: The flower died for want of water.
zh: 这花因为没水枯死了。

en: The flower comes out in early spring.
zh: 这种花早春就开了。

en: The flower died for lack of water.
zh: 这花因为缺水死掉了。

en: The flowers were very beautiful to look at.
zh: 那些花看着挺漂亮的。

en: Its flower is beautiful, but it bears no fruit.
zh: 这花挺好看的，但不结果。

en: The flower is opening.
zh: 花开了。

en: The flowers are protected against the weather.
zh: 那些花做了防风雨措施。

en: The flower gave out a sweet smell.
zh: 那朵花散发出一股清香。

en: The flower is alive with bees.
zh: 花丛里全是蜜蜂。

en: Put those flowers wherever we can see them well.
zh: 把那些花放在显眼的地方。

en: Focus your camera on the flower.
zh: 把相机对准那朵花。

en: It took a long time to put out the fire.
zh: 花了好长时间才把火扑灭。

en: The fire devoured the town.
zh: 大火吞噬了整个小镇。

en: The fire was brought about by children's playing with matches.
zh: 这场火是小孩玩火柴引起的。

en: The fire is remembered in history.
zh: 历史上记载了这场大火。

en: The fire was soon extinguished.
zh: 火很快就被扑灭了。

en: A fire broke out the day before yesterday.
zh: 前天起火了。

en: He was the only person to survive the fire.
zh: 他是那场大火里唯一的幸存者。

en: The fire consumed the whole house.
zh: 大火烧毁了整栋房子。

en: The fire reduced the house to ashes.
zh: 大火把房子烧成了灰烬。

en: Not all the houses around here were burned down in the fire.
zh: 这一带的房子并不是全都烧毁了。

en: Seven families were burned out by the fire.
zh: 这场火灾让七户人家无家可归。

en: The fire destroyed the tall building.
zh: 大火毁了那栋高楼。

en: The volcano poured molten rock.
zh: 火山喷出了岩浆。

en: The volcano erupted suddenly, killing many people.
zh: 火山突然喷发，导致很多人死亡。

en: The volcano erupts at regular intervals.
zh: 这座火山定期喷发。

en: The volcano has erupted twice this year.
zh: 这座火山今年已经喷发过两次了。
